--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The fall of the Roman Empire is a colossal triumph of Hollywood. This powerful film will surprise you with a fascinating history, breathtaking scenes and a cast of giants. Witness battles so far as the horizon, gladiators fighting in magnificent arenas, martyrs burning in deadly chariot races and stakes. In the middle of this extraordinary spetacle, the beautiful and tragic romance between the characters of Sophia Loren and Stephen Boyd. The fall of the Roman Empire captures all the glory, grandeur and luxury of this turbulent civilization, and brings life a story of eternal love.
